name: The Gas Station - Demo
description:
It is a first-person game with ps1 graphics, in this adventure you will discover what the darkness of the forest hides at your nightshift in a gas station.

Find out what's going on with the disappearances and deal with it if necessary.

NOTE: Resolution is forced to 800x600

MECHANICS:

Walk around and complete the tasks that the manager has left for you at the gas station.

What could go wrong?

Real-Time translation on language change. (no need to restart)

CONTROLS:

W A S D - Movement

Camera - Mouse

Turn On/Off Flashlight - Left Click / Right Click (Only in some levels)

Interact - E or Left Click / Right Click (Depends on the level)
